name: Cybird
description:
Flat Earth Society manipulates humans to believe that Earth is flat. Only few individuals such as Major Orbit are brave enough to tell the truth: Earth is half round.

With latest Cybird collect files, which prove Major Orbit's thesis.
Beware, every new file increases your speed!
Use Brake to temporarily make your vehicle more maneuverable.
Have fun!

Controls:
WSAD - Cybird's movement
Spacebar - Brake

Inspired by Major Suchodolski's video (Polish only, sorry!):
